Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iDWDet2D DETLEVEL_DW2D_MVO = 1 DETLEVEL_DW2D_SCSENS = 2 DETLEVEL_DW2D_50 = 3 DETLEVEL_DW2D_100 = 4 DETLEVEL_DW2D_200 = 7 DETLEVEL_DW2D_OFF = 8
! const values for parameter: iTransomOpeningType SASH_FIXED = 1 SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10
! const values for parameter: iDetLevelSectionElevation DETLEV_SE_SCALESENSITIVE = 1 DETLEV_SE_DETAILED = 2 DETLEV_SE_SIMPLE = 3 DETLEV_SE_OFF = 4
! const values for parameter: iDoorOpeningType SASH_FIXED = 1 SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10
! const values for parameter: iDoorTransomOpeningType SASH_FIXED = 1 SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10
! const values for parameter: iWindowOpeningType SASH_FIXED = 1 SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10
EPS = 0.0001
SHUTTER_LOUVER = 1 SHUTTER_FIX = 2 SHUTTER_FRAMED = 3 SHUTTER_HOLES = 4 SHUTTER_SOLID = 5

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"

Symbol.Script_UI:
! ============================================================================= ! Tabpage Structure Definition ! =============================================================================
! call all available page fix IDs call "ui_tabIDListHierarchy_m" parameters iUITreeStandardType = 1, !TERRACEDOOR_UI returned_parameters iUiID_Root, iUiID_General, iParID_General, iUiID_ShapeOpening, iParID_ShapeOpening, iUiID_OpLines, iParID_OpLines, iUiID_WindowFrame, iParID_WindowFrame, iUiID_SashLeaf, iParID_SashLeaf, iUiID_Grid, iParID_Grid, iUiID_SillBoard, iParID_SillBoard, iUiID_VenetianBlind, iParID_VenetianBlind, iUiID_Shutter, iParID_Shutter, iUiID_Closure, iParID_Closure, iUiID_ModelAttrib, iParID_ModelAttrib, iUiID_FloorPlanSection, iParID_FloorPlanSection, iUiID_Descriptions, iParID_Descriptions
! ============================================================================= ! Tabpages ! =============================================================================
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
for iTabs = 1 to vardim1(uiUsedPageIDs) if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_WindowFrame then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Коробка Окна`, "uiTab_DoorFrameStyle_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_WindowFrame then gosub "pageWindowFrame" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_SashLeaf then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Створка/Полотно`, "uiTab_DoorLeafSash_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_SashLeaf then gosub "pageSashLeaf" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_ShapeOpening then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Форма и Проем`, "uiTab_WindowShape_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_ShapeOpening then gosub "pageShapeOpening" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_Grid then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Переплеты`, "uitab_WindowSash_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_Grid then gosub "pageGrid" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_SillBoard then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Отлив и Доска`, "uiTab_WindowSillBoard_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_SillBoard then gosub "pageSillBoard" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_VenetianBlind then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Жалюзи`, "uiTab_BalconyVenetianBlinds_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_VenetianBlind then gosub "pageVenetianBlind" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_Shutter then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Ставни`, "uiTab_OpeningSunshade_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_Shutter then gosub "pageShutter" endif endif if uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1] = iUiID_Descriptions then ui_page uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][1], uiUsedPageIDs[iTabs][2], `Характеристики`, "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)" if gs_ui_current_page = iUiID_Descriptions then gosub "pageCallListing" endif endif next iTabs
file_dependence "uiTab_DoorFrameStyle_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_DoorLeafSash_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_WindowShape_flat(1)" file_dependence "uitab_WindowSash_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_WindowSillBoard_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_BalconyVenetianBlinds_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_OpeningSunshade_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
end
! ============================================================================= ! 2. Window Frame ! =============================================================================
"pageWindowFrame":
!********** horizontal section
px = 0 py = 130 + pageStartY
xs = 240 ys = 75
if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then ui_pict "balc_fr_1(13)", px, py, xs, ys, 1 else ui_pict "balc_fr_out_1(13)", px, py, xs, ys, 1 endif
ui_separator px+xs+10, pageStartY, px+xs+10, 230 + pageStartY
ui_style 0, 1
dy=pageStartY
ui_infield "gs_stockb", 10, dy, 15, 20 ui_outfield `Различная Ширина`, 31, dy + 3, 159, 20
ui_style 0, 0
dy=dy+12
!*** frame parameters
formatt = " "
n = request("Working_length_unit", "", formatt)
if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then
if gs_stockb = 0 then ui_infield "gs_frame_width", px+10, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки`
ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), px+xs/2-15, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), px+xs-42, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` else ui_infield "gs_stb_r", px+10, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Слева` ui_infield "gs_stb_m", px+xs/2-20, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Посередине` ui_infield "gs_stb_l", px+xs-50, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Справа` endif
else
if gs_stockb = 0 then ui_infield "gs_frame_width", px+10, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки`
ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), px+xs/2-15, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), px+xs-42, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` else ui_infield "gs_stb_l", px+10, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Слева` ui_infield "gs_stb_m", px+xs/2-20, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Посередине` ui_infield "gs_stb_r", px+xs-50, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Справа` endif
endif
!********** vertical section
xsv = 72 ysv = 230
pxv = px+xs+20 pyv = pageStartY
if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then ui_pict "balc_fr_v_1(13)", pxv, pyv, xsv, ysv, 1 else ui_pict "balc_fr_out_v_2(13)", pxv, pyv, xsv, ysv, 1 endif
ady = pageStartY - 30
ui_infield "gs_frame_thk", pxv+xsv+10, pageStartY - 2, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки`
if gs_stockb = 0 then ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), pxv+xsv+10, 57+ady, 50-10, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), pxv+xsv+10, 130+ady, 50-10, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_frame_width), pxv+xsv+61, 215+ady, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` else ui_infield "gs_stb_ob", pxv+xsv+10, 57+ady, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Вверху` ui_infield "gs_frame_width", pxv+xsv+10, 130+ady, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки` ui_infield "stb_w", pxv+xsv+61, 215+ady, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Окна Внизу` endif
ui_outfield `Окно`, pxv+xsv+5, 215+ady, 55, 20 ui_outfield `Дверь`, pxv+xsv+5, 239+ady, 55, 20
ui_infield "gs_stb_u", pxv+xsv+61, 236+ady, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Двери Внизу` return
! ============================================================================= ! 3. Leaf / Sash Settings ! =============================================================================
"pageSashLeaf":
pageStartY = 3
x_v = 50
!********** horizontal section
px = 0 py = 132 + pageStartY
xs = 240 ys = 75
ui_pict "balc_sash_1(13)", px, py, xs, ys, 1
ui_separator px+xs+10, pageStartY, px+xs+10, 230 + pageStartY
ui_style 0, 1
dy = pageStartY ui_infield "gs_ver_r", 10, dy, 20, 20 ui_outfield `Различная Ширина`, 31, dy + 3, 135, 20 dy = dy - 15
ui_style 0, 0
!*** frame parameters
formatt = " "
n = request("Working_length_unit", "", formatt)
ui_infield "gs_sash_width", px+20, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Обвязки Полотна`
ui_infield "gs_vb", px+xs-50, py-21, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Наложения Коробки/Полотна` ui_infield "gs_vt", px+xs-50, py+ys+5, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Наложения Коробки/Полотна`
!********** vertical section
xsv = 72 ysv = 230
pxv = px+xs+20 pyv = pageStartY
ui_pict "balc_sash_v_1(13)", pxv, pyv, xsv, ysv, 1
ui_infield "gs_sash_thk", pxv+xsv+8, 5 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Полотна`
if gs_ver_r = 0 then ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_sash_width), pxv+xsv+10, 35 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Обвязки Полотна` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_sash_width), pxv+xsv+10, 115 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Обвязки Полотна` ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_sash_width), pxv+xsv+5+50+1, 170 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Обвязки Полотна` else ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_rab_ob), pxv+xsv+10, 35 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Верхней Обвязки Полотна` ui_infield "gs_rab_ob", pxv+xsv+10, 115 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Верхней Обвязки Полотна` ui_infield "gs_rab_u", pxv+xsv+5+50+1, 165 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Рамы Створки Окна Внизу` endif
ui_outfield `Окно`, pxv+xsv+5, 170 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_outfield `Дверь`, pxv+xsv+5, 195 + pageStartY, 50, 20
ui_outfield str(formatt, gs_sash_width), pxv+xsv+10, 82 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Обвязки Полотна` ui_infield "rab_u2", pxv+xsv+5+50+1, 193 + pageStartY, 50, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Нижней Обвязки Полотна` return
! ============================================================================= ! 4. Elevation and Opening Tabpage ! =============================================================================
"pageShapeOpening": pageStartY = 3
ui_style 0, 0
sep1x = 270 seply = 50 + pageStartY
x = sep1x-210 y = seply+10
cx = 55
dy = 20
ui_separator sep1x, pageStartY, sep1x, 230 + pageStartY ui_separator 0, seply, sep1x-2, seply
if gs_kamp = 1 then ui_pict "ui_balc_1_t(13)", x, y, 140, 140, 1 ui_infield "gs_k", x+140+5, y+60, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Фрамуги в` else ui_pict "ui_balc_1(13)", x, y, 140, 140, 1 endif
ui_infield "parapeth", 4, y+100, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Ниши` ui_infield "bf1", x+20, y+140+5, cx, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Окна`
y = 3 + pageStartY
ui_infield{3} "gs_kamp", 5, y, 130, 18, 7,"",2,1, 0,0,0,0, 1,`Фрамуга`, 0, 2,`Фрамуга`, 1
y = y + dy
ui_infield{3} "symm", 5, y, 130, 25, 7,"",2,1, 0,0,0,0, 1,`Равная Ширина Двери и Окна`, 0, 2,`Равная Ширина Двери и Окна`, 1
!************************ Opening parameters
y = 6 + pageStartY
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Открывание`, sep1x+10, y, 80, 18 y = y + dy - 5
ui_separator sep1x+2, 30 + pageStartY, 440, 30 + pageStartY
if gs_ui_sub_tabpage2 = 1 then
!*** 3D Opening
ui_infield{3} "gs_ui_sub_tabpage2", 365, pageStartY, 64, 25, 4, "uiTabsub_Terrace_opening_flat(1)", 2, 1, 0,0, 28,21, 1, "", 1, 2, "", 2 ui_tooltip `Выбор Параметров Проема в 3D/2D`
y = y + dy - 9
!*** opening type
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `Тип`, sep1x+30, y, 85, 18 ui_outfield `Угол`, sep1x+120, y, 70, 18 y = y + dy + 4
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `1.`, sep1x+10, y, 20, 18 ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "iWindowOpeningType", sep1x+30, y-3, 80, 18 ui_infield "gs_op", sep1x+120, y-3, 55, 18 y = y + dy
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `2.`, sep1x+10, y, 20, 18 ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "iDoorOpeningType", sep1x+30, y-3, 80, 18 ui_infield "op2", sep1x+120, y-3, 55, 18 y = y + dy
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `3.`, sep1x+10, y, 20, 18 ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "iTransomOpeningType", sep1x+30, y-3, 80, 18 ui_infield "gs_opt", sep1x+120, y-3, 55, 18 y = y + dy
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `4.`, sep1x+10, y, 20, 18 ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "iDoorTransomOpeningType", sep1x+30, y-3, 80, 18 ui_infield "opt2", sep1x+120, y-3, 55, 18 y = y + dy
!*** opening angle / line type
x_t = 45 x_v = 50 x_v2 = 52
y = y + dy y = y + dy y = y + dy y = y + dy y = y + dy
endif
if gs_ui_sub_tabpage2 = 2 then
!*** 2D Opening
ui_infield{3} "gs_ui_sub_tabpage2", 365, pageStartY, 64, 25, 4, "uiTabsub_Terrace_opening_flat(1)", 2, 1, 0,0, 28,21, 1, "", 1, 2, "", 2 ui_tooltip `Выбор Параметров Проема в 3D/2D`
xt = 85 xv1 = 60 xv2 = 75 ys = 23
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `Дверь`, sep1x+10, y+dy+3, 85, ys dy = dy + ys + 1
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Угол в 2D`, sep1x+10, y+dy+3, 85, ys ui_infield "gs_ow21", sep1x+10+85+1, y+dy, xv1, ys dy = dy + ys + 1
dy = dy + ys + 1
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `Окно`, sep1x+10, y+dy+3, 85, ys dy = dy + ys + 1
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Угол в 2D`, sep1x+10, y+dy+3, 85, ys ui_infield "gs_ow22", sep1x+10+85+1, y+dy, xv1, ys dy = dy + ys + 1
dy = dy + ys + 1
endif return
! ============================================================================= ! 5. Grid Settings Tabpage ! =============================================================================
"pageGrid": pageStartY = 8
x = 30 y = pageStartY
sep1x = 200 seply = 167 + pageStartY
xt = 55 xv = 45
dy = 3
ui_separator sep1x, pageStartY - 5, sep1x, seply-1 ui_separator 0, seply, 444, seply
ui_pict "ui_balc_1_t_gr(13)", x, y, 140, 140, 1
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `Переплеты`, 5, seply+3, 88, 18 dy = dy + 19
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Ширина`, 10, seply+dy, 80, 18 ui_infield "gs_spb", 95, seply+dy-3, 50, 20 dy=dy+21 ui_outfield `Толщина`, 10, seply+dy, 80, 18 ui_infield "gs_sps", 95, seply+dy-3, 50, 20
!**** panes number
ui_style 0, 1
dy = 0
ui_outfield `1. Количество Стекол Створки Окна`, sep1x+10, y+dy, 230, 18 dy = dy + 21
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Вертикаль`, sep1x+20, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "gs_sh", sep1x+20+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20 ui_outfield `По Вертик.`, sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "gs_sv", sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20
dy = dy + 22
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `2. Количество Стекол Полотна Двери`, sep1x+10, y+dy, 230, 18 dy = dy + 19
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Вертикаль`, sep1x+20, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "sh2", sep1x+20+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20 ui_outfield `По Вертик.`, sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "sv2", sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20
dy = dy + 22
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `3. Количество Стекол Фрамуги 1`, sep1x+10, y+dy, 230, 18 dy = dy + 19
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Вертикаль`, sep1x+20, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "gs_sho", sep1x+20+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20 ui_outfield `По Вертик.`, sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "gs_svo", sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20
dy = dy + 22
ui_style 0, 1
ui_outfield `4. Количество Стекол Фрамуги 2`, sep1x+10, y+dy, 230, 18 dy = dy + 19
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield `Вертикаль`, sep1x+20, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_outfield str((gs_sho+1), 2, 0), sep1x+20+55+2, y+dy+3, xv, 20 ui_outfield `По Вертик.`, sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15, y+dy+3, 55, 20 ui_infield "svo2", sep1x+20+55+2+xv+15+55+2, y+dy, xv, 20 return
! ============================================================================= ! 6. Sill Settings Tabpage ! =============================================================================
"pageSillBoard": pageStartY = 3
px = 50 py = 25 + pageStartY
xs = 156 ys = 100
xv = 45 x_sep = px+xs+55
ui_separator x_sep, pageStartY - 3, x_sep, 230 + pageStartY
!*** sill type ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Тип`, 10, py+110, 120, 20
ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "iSillType", 131, py+105, 45, 25, 2, "sill_type_bal(13)", 2, 1, 45, 25, 32, 22, 1, `Сплошной`, 1, ! Solid 2, `Металл`, 2 ! Metal
!*** sill pict
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Отлив`, 10, pageStartY, 110, 20
ui_style 0, 0
if iSillType = 1 then ! Solid sill
!*** solid sill
ui_pict "balc_sill(13)", px, py, xs, ys, 1
ui_infield "gs_w", px+xs+2, py+54, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Капельника` ui_infield "gs_nd", px+xs+2, py+ys-15, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Глубина Капельника` ui_infield "gs_nh", px+xs+2, py+33, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Отлива Снаружи`
else
!*** metal sill
ui_pict "balc_sill_m(13)", px, py, xs, ys, 1
ui_infield "gs_nh", px+xs+2, py+50, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Отлива Снаружи`
endif
ui_infield "gs_fbl", px+xs+2, py-4, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Глубина Отлива` ui_infield "gs_fbh", 0, py+40, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Отлива Внутри`
!*** board pict
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Доска`, x_sep+10, pageStartY, 120, 20
ui_pict "balc_board_wallins(13)", x_sep+10+xv+1, py, 120, 100, 1
ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield "gs_sfbi", x_sep+10, py+45, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Высота Доски` ui_infield "gs_siv", x_sep+10, py-5, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Глубина Доски` ui_infield "gs_thn", x_sep+10, py+ys-15, xv, 20 ui_tooltip `Глубина Подоконной Ниши`
!*** Wall Inset
ui_infield "gs_hn", x_sep+10, py+100+12, 20, 20 ui_outfield `Подоконная Ниша`, x_sep+31, py+100+14, 120, 20
!*** overhang parameters + materials
ui_style 0, 0
pyy = py+100+38 dy=0
ui_outfield `Выступ Сбоку`, 10, pyy, 120, 20 ui_infield "gs_suba_l", 131, pyy-3, 50, 20 dy=dy+21 ui_outfield `Выступ Сбоку 2`, 10, pyy+dy, 120, 20 ui_infield "gs_suba_r", 131, pyy-3+dy, 50, 20
dy=0 ui_outfield `Выступ Сбоку`, x_sep+10, pyy, 120, 20 ui_infield "gs_subi_l", x_sep+131, pyy-3, 50, 20 dy=dy+21 ui_outfield `Выступ Сбоку 2`, x_sep+10, pyy+dy, 120, 20 ui_infield "gs_subi_r", x_sep+131, pyy-3+dy, 50, 20
return
! ============================================================================= ! 7. Venetian Blinds Settings Tabpage ! =============================================================================
"pageVenetianBlind": pageStartY = 16
px = 20 py = 52 + pageStartY xd = 92 yd = 115 dy = 0
sep_x = px + xd + 10
ui_style 0, 1
ui_infield "sonn", 20, pageStartY, 20, 20 ui_outfield `На Окне`, 41, pageStartY + 3, 110, 20
ui_infield "sonn2", 20, 21 + pageStartY, 20, 20 ui_outfield `На Двери`, 41, 23 + pageStartY, 110, 20
ui_style 0, 0
if sonn+sonn2>0 then ui_pict "1_Flugelf_sonn_44(13)", px, py, xd, yd, 1 else ui_pict "1_Flugelf_sonn_5(13)", px, py, xd, yd, 1 endif
ui_outfield "hl:", sep_x+10, py+3, 15, 20 ui_outfield `Ширина Ламелей`, sep_x+10+17, py+3, 95, 20 ui_infield "ws", sep_x+151, py, 50, 22
dy = dy + 23
ui_outfield `Поворот Ламелей - %`, sep_x+10, py+3+dy, 140, 20 ui_infield "rotation", sep_x+151, py+dy, 50, 22 dy = dy + 23
ui_outfield `Открытие в 3D - %`, sep_x+10, py+3+dy, 140, 20 ui_infield "offlam", sep_x+151, py+dy, 50, 22 dy = dy + 23
return
! ============================================================================= ! 8. Shutter Settings Tabpage ! =============================================================================
"pageShutter": pageStartY = 3
py = 62 + pageStartY x1 = 10
ui_style 0, 1
ui_infield "t_sonn", x1, pageStartY, 20, 20 ui_outfield `Ставни`, x1+21, pageStartY+3, 120, 20
ui_outfield `Стиль Полотна`, x1, 24+pageStartY+3, 100, 20 ui_infield "shutterStyle", x1+102, 24+pageStartY, 100, 20
ui_style 0, 0
if iShutterStyle = SHUTTER_HOLES then ui_pict "1-Flu_schiebe_sn_gel(13)", x1, py, 92, 115, 1 endif
if iShutterStyle = SHUTTER_FIX or iShutterStyle = SHUTTER_LOUVER then ui_pict "1-Flu_schiebe_sn_lam(13)", x1, py, 92, 115, 1 endif
if iShutterStyle = SHUTTER_FRAMED then ui_pict "1-Flu_schiebe_sn_rah(13)", x1, py, 92, 115, 1 endif
if iShutterStyle = SHUTTER_SOLID then ui_pict "1-Flu_schiebe_sn_vol(13)", x1, py, 92, 115, 1 endif
!*** parameters
xt = 100 xv = 50 dy = 0 xa = 25
xx = x1+100
ui_outfield "rb:", xx, py, 25, 20 ui_outfield `Ширина Коробки`, xx+25+1, py, 100, 20 ui_infield "rab_s", xx+25+100+2, py-5, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Ширина Коробки Внизу`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "rabu_s", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield "rs:", xx, py+dy, 25, 20 ui_outfield `Толщина Коробки`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "ras_s", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield "hl:", xx, py+dy, 25, 20 ui_outfield `Ширина Ламелей`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "hlbsc", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Поворот Ламелей`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "alpha", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Открытие в 3D - %`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "offladen", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield "sb:", xx, py+dy, 25, 20 ui_outfield `Толщина Направляющей`, xx+25+1, py+dy, 100, 20 ui_infield "sck", xx+25+100+2, py-5+dy, 50, 20 dy = dy + 21
!*** parameters 2
x2 = 310 y = 59 + pageStartY dy = 0
ui_infield "bedec", x2, y+dy, 20, 20 ui_outfield `Отлив`, x2+21, y+3+dy, 84, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Отв. по Гориз.`, x2, y+3+dy, 84, 20 ui_infield "nnsc", x2+85, y+dy, 40, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Отв. по Верт.`, x2, y+3+dy, 84, 20 ui_infield "mmsc", x2+85, y+dy, 40, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Радиус Отверстия`, x2, y+3+dy, 84, 20 ui_infield "rsc", x2+85, y+dy, 40, 20 dy = dy + 21
ui_outfield `Разрешение Отверстия`, x2, y+3+dy, 84, 20 ui_infield "res", x2+85, y+dy, 40, 20 dy = dy + 21 + 1
return
"pageCallListing": call "ui_Description_m" parameters iDWObjectType = 3, ! TERRACE_D_OBJECT gs_show_UKListParams = 0, listFieldID = iUiID_Descriptions, gs_bOpeningToZone = gs_bOpeningToZone, gs_list_cost = gs_list_cost, gs_list_manufacturer = gs_list_manufacturer, gs_list_note = gs_list_note, gs_list_location = gs_list_location, gs_list_location_as = gs_list_location_as, gs_list_accessories = gs_list_accessories, gs_list_glazing = gs_list_glazing, gs_list_headdet = gs_list_headdet, gs_list_jambdet = gs_list_jambdet, gs_list_silldet = gs_list_silldet, gs_list_hwsetno = gs_list_hwsetno, gs_list_optype = gs_list_optype, gs_list_finish = gs_list_finish, gs_list_elevation = gs_list_elevation, gs_list_hings = gs_list_hings, gs_list_lockset = gs_list_lockset, gs_list_glassarea_tmp = gs_list_glassarea_tmp, gs_list_glassarea_override = gs_list_glassarea_override, gs_list_glassarea = gs_list_glassarea, gs_list_glassperimeter = gs_list_glassperimeter, gs_list_heattransfer = gs_list_heattransfer, gs_list_firerating = gs_list_firerating, gs_list_acousticrating = gs_list_acousticrating, FM_Type = FM_Type, iFMType = iFMType, FM_InventoryNumber = FM_InventoryNumber, FM_SerialNumber = FM_SerialNumber, FM_ProductionYear = FM_ProductionYear, FM_ObjectWeight = FM_ObjectWeight, FM_ObjectWeightUnit = FM_ObjectWeightUnit, gs_list_orientationDef_m = gs_list_orientationDef_m, ifc_optypestr = ifc_optypestr, ifc_optype = ifc_optype return
